post:
![](https://maximumvps.net/img/maxvps2111.png)  
  

Maximum Virtual Private Servers, LLC is a Washington State **registered company**.  We have been in business since February, 2013. Quick AUP: We do not allow camfrog, virtual currency mining, TOR exit nodes, Or Hitleap. [Full AUP here.](http://maximumvps.net/clients/aup.php)
 
  
-----
 
The Offers
-----
 
**64MB RAM Special**

* RAM: **64**MB
* IPs: **1** IPv4, IPv6 **on request**
* HDD: **5**GB RAID **10** Protected Storage
* CPU: **1** Shared Xeon® Core
* Bandwidth: **56**GB at **1**Gbps
* Virtualization: **KVM**
* Locations: **Jacksonville, FL** and **Los Angeles, CA**
 
**Only $8.5/year or 1.37$/month**
 
**Order: [Jacksonville, FL](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=50&sld=whmcs&tld=.com) or [Los Angeles, CA](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=49&sld=whmcs&tld=.com)**
 
-----  
  
**128MB RAM Special**

* RAM: **128**MB
* IPs: **1** IPv4, IPv6 **on request**
* HDD: **5**GB RAID **10** Protected Storage
* CPU: **1** Shared Xeon® Core
* Bandwidth: **128**GB at **1**Gbps
* Virtualization: **KVM**
* Locations: **Jacksonville, FL** and **Los Angeles, CA**
 
**Only $12.50/year**
 
**Order: [Jacksonville, FL]( https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=30&sld=whmcs&tld=.com) or [Los Angeles, CA](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=9&sld=whmcs&tld=.com)**
 
-----  
  
**1GB RAM Special**
 
* RAM: **1024**MB
* IPs: **4** IPv4, **16** IPv6
* CPU: **1** Shared Xeon® Cores
* HDD: **20**GB RAID **10** Protected Storage
* Bandwidth: **1024**GB at 1Gbps
* Virtualization: **KVM**
* Location: **Jacksonville, Florida**
 
**Only $3.5/month ([Order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=32&sld=whmcs&tld=.com))**
 
-----  
  
**2GB RAM Special**
 
* RAM: **2048**MB
* IPs: **4** IPv4, **16** IPv6
* CPU: **2** Shared Xeon® Cores
* HDD: **40**GB RAID **10** Protected Storage
* Bandwidth: **2048**GB at 1Gbps
* Virtualization: **KVM**
* Location: **Jacksonville, Florida**
 
**Only $7/month ([Order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=51&sld=whmcs&tld=.com))**   
  
-----  
  
**Current Node specifications**   

* Dual Intel Xeon® L5420
* 16GB+ ECC RAM
* 4 x 1TB Western Digital RE Drives
* Adaptec 3405 Hardware RAID with Battery Backup
 
---
**Locations**


* QuadraNet in **Los Angeles, CA** ([Looking Glass](http://lg.maximumvps.net))
* GoRack in **Jacksonville, FL** ([Looking Glass](http://lgjf.maximumvps.net))
 
We colocate our own hardware in both facilities.
